pr_title: Update block damaging checks in teleportation safety

timeline.message: Update block damaging checks in teleportation safety

timeline.author: JRoy
JRoy
JRoy
JRoy

replies.bodyText: I think this is intended only to match a Nether portal. In isBlockDamaging it's checked, presumably so that players are not teleported into a block of a portal, where you can essentially get stuck and not be able to type commands or break blocks anymore.
replies.author: pop4959

timeline.message: Alphabetize materials and add wither rose
